product_name: Ahnu Elkridge II Mid Waterproof Hiking Boots - Men's
long_description: With tough nubuck and protective synthetic leather uppers, the Ahnu Elkridge II Mid Waterproof hiking boots are lightweight and durable for on-trail comfort, support and lasting performance. Highly breathable eVent(TM) waterproof membranes keep the elements out while allowing perspiration to dissipate and vent quickly. Synthetic mesh linings wick moisture away from feet. Dual-density EVA midsoles provide shock absorption and cushioning comfort underfoot; EVA medial and lateral stability posts provide extra support. Thermoplastic urethane arch shanks and forefoot plates supply support and torsional rigidity, and help prevent stone bruising. Nonmarking rubber outsoles on the Ahnu Elkridge Mid waterproof hiking boots feature multidirectional lugs for great traction on different types of terrain.
short_description: With tough nubuck and protective synthetic leather uppers, the Ahnu Elkridge II Mid Waterproof hiking boots are lightweight and durable for on-trail comfort, support and lasting performance.
